ValidationMessages.AlreadyWorkspaceExists: Workspace details provided by user already exists
ValidationMessages.InvalidCapacityId: CapacityId provided by user is not valid
ValidationMessages.WorkspaceEmpty: Workspace displayName can not be empty
ValidationMessages.CapacityEmpty: Capacity for workspace can not be empty
ValidationMessages.CreateWorkspaceRequestEmpty: Request object sent for create workspace is empty.All required properties are not sent for workspace creation
ValidationMessages.GetWorkspaceRequestEmpty: Request object sent for get workspace is empty.All required properties are not sent for workspace fetching
ValidationMessages.ListWorkspaceRequestEmpty: Request object sent for list workspace is empty.All required properties are not sent for workspace listing
ValidationMessages.ItemDisplayNameEmpty: Item displayName can not be empty
ValidationMessages.InvalidFabricType: Fabric Type should be a valid type
ValidationMessages.AlreadyItemExists: Item details provided by user already exists in a given workspace
ValidationMessages.CreateItemRequestEmpty: Request object sent for item is empty.All required properties are not sent for Item creation
ValidationMessages.GetItemRequestEmpty: Request object sent for get item is empty.All required properties are not sent for item fetching
ValidationMessages.ListItemRequestEmpty: Request object sent for list item is empty.All required properties are not sent for item listing
ValidationMessages.OBOEmpty: OBO Token can not be empty
